alert.note: Alert for Baylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 8:40PM CDT until March 23 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Baylor County in northern Texas... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 840 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Seymour, moving east-northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Seymour, Mabelle, Lake Diversion and southern Lake Kemp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
